I know that you are trying to make me feel hurt and all but the actual truth of it is that I'm actually thankful to you. I now know that at lease someone keeps reading this thing. And you read all of my entries so I feel pretty special that you keep checking up on me and everything. And i know that you are trying to be hurtful to me. But I just wanted to say thank you for reading all about all of my problems and everything I am going through.
Thank you
Erin

He always wanted to explain things.
But no one cared. 
So he drew.
Sometimes he would draw and it wasn't anything. 
He wanted to carve it in stone or write it in the sky.
He would lie out on the grass and look up at the sky. 
And it would be only the sky and him and the things inside of him that needed saying.
And it was after that he drew the picture.
He kept it under his pillow and would let no one see it. 
And he would look at it every night and think about it. 
And when it was dark and his eyes were closed, he could see it. 
And it was all of him.
And he loved it. 
When he started school he brought it with him. 
Not to show anyone, but just to have it with him like a friend. 
It was funny about school.
He sat in a square, brown room. 
Like all the other rooms.
And it was tight and closed.
And stiff.
He hated to hold the pencil and chalk.
With his arm stiff and his feet flat on the floor,
stiff.
With his teacher watching and watching.
The teacher came and smiled at him.
She told him to wear a tie like all the other boys.
He said he didn't matter. 
After that they drew.
And he drew all yellow and it was the way he felt about morning.
The teacher came and smiled at him.
"What's this?" she said, "why don't you draw like Ken's drawing"
"Isn't that beautiful?"
After that his mother bought him a tie. 
And he always drew rocket ships and airplanes like everyone else.
And he threw the old picture away.
And when he lay out alone looking at the sky.
It was big and blue and all of everything,
But he wasn't anymore.
He was a sweare inside the brouwn.
And his hands were stiff.
And the things inside of him that needed saying didn't need it anymore.
It had stopped pushing.
It was crushed.
Stiff.
Like everything else.


(This poem was handed to a grade Twelve English Teacher. Two Weeks later the student committed suicide.)

Alright so people these past few days have been really really hard.Eric hasnt been doing all that great latly. And tuesday night he had to go to the hospital. He hasnt been able to get out of bed for a couple of days. I think its the kemo and everything but I dont really know. I have cried myself to sleep the past to nights and i have just a hard time with this. Eric has always been there for me and i have always gone to him when i needed someone but what happenes when he isnt there for me to go to? Its just that the docters thought he had beat if for a while there (it was like a month) They couldnt find any cancer in him. But then he went back in and they were just like "oops look we found more cancer". And that kind of pisses me off! Cause everything was alright for a while and then now its even worse. But im just really really scared for him right now. 
Keep Eric in your prayers please
Erin

And no one really has A lunch with me! Sarah is in it with me (which i love) but i not many others and not laura! which makes me sad ::tear tear::
And well the whole think kind of sucks cause i have to switch schools (it goes Canton, Plymouth, Plymouth, Canton, Plymouth, Plymouth) And i never really had to switch schools all that often for  the past two years but now i do! 

Okay so i want to go back to school but i dont at the same exact time! EHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!! 

And well im grounded....I know it sucks but sarah says she is ganna come break me out! 

bottledTears81: i will ride my bike to ur house...break down ur door and stuff u in the trunk of my bike and ride off into the sunset, u will never be heard of again from ur mother

Haha i love you sarah! You rock my socks off!

Well people im mainly talking about nothing in this entry so i shall go
XoXo

xoxo!
miss you all
muah!
Miss Erin Marie

Next Natalie said this to me "Get out of my damn castle BITCH!" I swear i didnt say damn or bitch around them....Next Brendon used fuck....sure i said that but thats when i thought i lost the kid... Okay so this week started off really really sucky. For those of you who dont know me and my friend Eric made this deal that if I dont drink he doesnt...And this all started after i found out he had cancer.... Well i went over to his house on monday to find him wasted to shit...of coarse. Well ets just say that the night was dround in a tub of icecream and my dashboard CD...Gatta love them! But I have been clean for like 5 months now and it feels great so who cares about stupid eric anyways... Well actually i shouldnt say that cause i love that kid...Known him since i was like 8.. and i dont know what i would do without him but screw him for now

Well then this is where the week gets really really eventfull and interesting

On wednesday you all know that we had that HUGE ASS storm right?? OF COARSE YOU ALL DO....Well lightning stuck the side of my house causing a HUGE power surge....My TV is fried.....all of my lamps were crap...The Air Conditioning was toast...And of coarse the computer just melted.... So what did i do for entertainment in a house that is burning hot, has no tv...no electisity in my room?? OHH this is great...I organised my closit! WHOO HOO WHAT A FUN TIME....

Well now we have this new computer...and its all good in the hood(haha good stuff laura) AND MY CLOSET IS SOO CLEAN! We got the AC working again and got all the lamps fixed in my room... But that WAS one scary ass storm if i do say so myself...Had a heart attack when lighting hit the house....Whoa scary shit

Well then on yesterday...My dog had a little run in with a scunk...Awww my poor poor smelly pink dog.....My backyard still smells and she is pink from the tomato juice bath...

Well that was my week and Im just so glad to have a computer back...But allas i shall go now

luv you all

Erin Marie Broughman

Erin Marie
